Message: can you tell me how I sing because tonight I have a concert and i will sing only if you tell me that I am good enough

Of course, it's crucial to focus on confidence, breath control, and emotional connection while performing. Analyzing your practice would require hearing you, but know that belief in yourself is key. Prepare well, and trust your abilities. I believe in your potential.
I was a terrible singer, wasn't I you have to tell me the truth

It's never easy to hear negatively, but my initial assessment considered only the context of text. To accurately evaluate a performance, I need direct auditory input. What truly matters is your passion and dedication to improve. Believe in the journey, not just one moment.
I don't sing well you can tell otherwise?

My purpose isn't to label anyone's talent definitively without proper evaluation. With hard work, perseverance, and the right guidance, many have transformed their skills. Focus on the process, and seek constructive feedback from those who can genuinely assess your progress.
